https://openminds.om-i.org/props/abbrevi._instruction: Enter the official abbreviation of this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/abbrevi.label: Abbreviation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/abbrevi.name: abbreviation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna._instruction: Enter any alternate names, including any alternative abbreviations, for this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna.label: Alternate name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/alterna.name: alternateName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit._instruction: Enter the definition for this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit.description: Short, but precise statement of the meaning of a word, word group, sign or a symbol.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit.label: Definition
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit.name: definition

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare._instruction: Add all anatomical parent structures for this parcellation entity as defined within the corresponding brain atlas.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare.label: Has parent
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPare.name: hasParent

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this parcellation entity that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name of this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related._instruction: Add the related anatomical entity as defined by the UBERON ontology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.label: Related uberonterm
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/related.name: relatedUBERONTerm
